issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Run UrbanAirship Application github: titanium_mobile_tests_internal
2. Click on the Enable Push
3. View the logs

Actual:
D/UrbanAirship - UALib( 2578): Starting C2DM
I/UrbanAirship - UALib( 2578): Initializing C2DM Push ...
D/UrbanAirship - UALib( 2578): Generating APID: 73fc6a91-d8cb-42dd-b6d1-0fe793f99e52
W/TiVerify( 2578): (Timer-0) [5005,5005] Verifying module licenses...
I/TiVerify( 2578): (Timer-0) [299,5304] Succesfully verified module licenses
E/UrbanAirship - UALib( 2578): Error posting to /firstrun
E/UrbanAirship - UALib( 2578): BoxOffice failure.
E/UrbanAirship - UALib( 2578): BoxOffice firstRun failed. Unable to continue C2DM registration.

Expected:
To complete registration and display the APID

Note:
Works on 
Nexus One 2.2
Xoom 3.2.1
Droid 2.3.4
fields.summary: Android: UrbanAirship: Rhino/V8: Certain devices are failing on registration for urban airship
fields.environment:
Mac 10.6.8
Studio: 1.0.7.201112152014
SDK: 1.8.0.1.RC3
Devices: GalaxyNexus 4.0.2, Emulator 2.2, Nook Color 2.2

comments.body: Closing due to time passed and lack of progress and input.
